summary: This document is a Certificate of Existence issued by Osbert E. Potter, the Lieutenant Governor of the Virgin Islands, certifying that JEGE, LLC is duly organized under the laws of the United States Virgin Islands. It confirms the company's perpetual duration and that all applicable fees have been paid.

persons.name: Osbert E. Potter
persons.context: Osbert E. Potter is the issuing authority of the Certificate of Existence for JEGE, LLC.

keyFacts: JEGE, LLC filed Articles of Organization on October 19, 2012.
The company is organized under the laws of the United States Virgin Islands.
The duration of JEGE, LLC is perpetual.
All applicable fees have been paid by the company.
No Articles of Termination have been filed by the company.
